Context: The School of Accounting and Finance offers diploma, advanced diploma, degree, and graduate certificate programs. Their practical approach to financial services studies combines business and finance to prepare students for diverse career options in the financial services sector. The financial services sector is critical to both the Canadian economy and that of the Toronto region. George Brown College provides a free Entry Advising service to help match skills, backgrounds, and career goals with program options. Prospective students can attend an information session or sign up for a campus tour to learn more about the programs and facilities. The contact information is 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559) and ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Additional resources include their social media hub, land acknowledgment page, and sign-up form for college news and updates. The information on this website is subject to change without notice, and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
